Ooohhh nice.   Makes for a great storyline.  Can't wait to see what happens=
. Chat later, off to do an errand.

Perpetually on the move and constantly =
busy. 

On Sep 20, 2011, at 12:11 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@gmail.c=
om> wrote:

> It sounds good. The battle of Tuscon against Rodimus will not=
 come
> yet, but I have no problem with Tuscon being able to check that out=

> when that time does come.
> 
> And have no fear, one way or another the =
truth will come out as to
> which one the clone really is. But one thing I =
will say is that BOTH
> renditions of Rodimus looks, acts, walks and talks =
enough like Rodimus
> that even Nightlight cannot tell the difference, or E=
lita if she were
> here.
> 
> So is the fake Rodimus the red/orange made to=
 throw off the Maximals
> or is the black one the fake?
> 
> Stay tuned for=
 the revelation coming to a computer near you soon!
> 
> I will post, it wi=
ll just be slower, not as much stuff in each one,
> and I may miss some of =
the posts :)
> 
> - Preston
>

wrote:

ng

>=
 > where Tucson's suspicion of a clone proves correct. The only way he woul=
d
> > know for sure is if Dark Rodimus's spark chamber gets knocked open du=
ring
> > the fight. In order to do that I was wondering if you would allow =
Tucson to
> > get in a few good hits as he too can take a few of his own. I=
 fully allow
> > for Tucson to take a beating and I was wondering if you wo=
uld allow the same
> > for Dark Rodimus. And you get to chose which mode th=
ey fight in.
> >
> > Also , whoever else he's put up against, which could v=
ery well be a fellow
> > comrade, he will explain his strategy via silent c=
om and inform them that
> > he's playing the part to be strategic. He has t=
o make it look real if he
> > is going to attempt to fool Magmatron, which =
is going to be an ulitimate
> > challenge of wisdom. When you can't beat th=
em you can at least act as if
> > you're going to join them. And all is wel=
l if you can pull off the
> > deception carefully. Tucson realizes he can n=
ot defeat Magmatron in a one
> > on one but, he can find a way around him. =
He will definitely gather troops
> > on all sides for the fight against Mag=
matron, including the Preds and
> > Decepticons who are also annoyed with M=
agmatron. I will send Airly a
> > message about that and see what she think=
s, but only after I hear from you.
> > That's it for now. Happy writing. ^^=

> >

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Ooohhh nice.   Makes for a great =
storyline.  Can't wait to see what happens. Chat later, off to do an e=
rrand.<br><br>Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. </div><div>=
<br>On Sep 20, 2011, at 12:11 PM, Super Cyclonus <<a href=3D"mailto:supe=
rcyclonus@...">supercyclonus@...</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><d=
iv></div><blockquote type=3D"cite"><div>




<span style=3D"display:none">&=
nbsp;</span>



    <div id=3D"ygrp-text">
      
      
      <p>It sounds=
 good. The battle of Tuscon against Rodimus will not come<br>
yet, but I ha=
ve no problem with Tuscon being able to check that out<br>
when that time d=
oes come.<br>
<br>
And have no fear, one way or another the truth will come=
 out as to<br>
which one the clone really is. But one thing I will say is t=
hat BOTH<br>
renditions of Rodimus looks, acts, walks and talks enough like=
 Rodimus<br>
that even Nightlight cannot tell the difference, or Elita if s=
he were<br>
here.<br>
<br>
So is the fake Rodimus the red/orange made to th=
row off the Maximals<br>
or is the black one the fake?<br>
<br>
Stay tuned =
for the revelation coming to a computer near you soon!<br>
<br>
I will post=
, it will just be slower, not as much stuff in each one,<br>
and I may miss=
 some of the posts :)<br>
<br>
- Preston<br>
<br>

.com">magicquartz@...</a></a>> wrote:<br>

spicion of a clone proves correct.  The only way he would<br>

the fight.  In order to do that I was wondering if you would allow Tucson t=
o<br>

ully allow<br>

h mode they fight in.<br>

inst, which could very well be a fellow<br>

is strategy via silent com and inform them that<br>

art to be strategic.   He has to make it look real if he<br>

to attempt to fool Magmatron, which is going to be an ulitimate<br>

allenge of wisdom.  When you can't beat them you can at least act as if<br>=

r>

n a one<br>

ely gather troops<br>

cluding the Preds and<br>

ron.  I will send Airly a<br>

ks, but only after I hear from you.<br>

ing.  ^^<br>
